Name: GLOBAL:SOFAConventions
Comment: This conventions stores TFs depending in the Emiiter for general purposes, i.e., only the SOFA general metadata are predefined. This convention is based on GeneralTF.

Name: GLOBAL:DataType
Comment: We store frequency-dependent data depending on the Emitter here.

Name: GLOBAL:License
Default: No license provided, ask the author for permission

Name: GLOBAL:RoomType
Comment: It can be free field, reverberant, shoebox or dae.

Name: Data.Real
Comment: The real part of the complex spectrum.

Name: Data.Imag
Comment: The imaginary part of the complex spectrum.

Name: N:Units
Comment: Unit of the values given in N.
